content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Good afternoon, Max. Thank you for considering my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your proposed price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am a student and want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am responsible for the apartment and want to make sure that the landlord is satisfied with my tenancy.

Regarding the rental price, I am willing to negotiate, but I would like to know the starting point. What is the monthly rental for this apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. The starting point for the monthly rental is 1,500 Euros. However, I am open to discussing a lower price if you would like to rent the apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to rent the apartment for 1,250 Euros per month. I understand that this may be below the starting point, but I am confident that we can come to an agreement that is fair for both of us.

I would like to clarify that I am a responsible tenant and will make sure to take care of the apartment while I am living there. I also understand the importance of being on good terms with my landlord and will do my best to maintain a positive relationship.

I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Max. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. I will consider your offer and get back to you with my decision. In the meantime, please let me know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
